attributes.action:
BRING BACK TEXTBOOKS TO SCHOOLS
We want our kids future to be bright, not dark!
attributes.additional_details:
Aver.day at EU school:
Kids have daily plan e.g. Monday 8-9am maths, 9-10am english...etc so parents are aware
Kids get marks to special book EACH day with grades 1-5 (1 best, 5 worse) for e.g.tests in "addition" or explaining what they learnt on science yesterday and parents have to sign each day their grades.EVERY DAY they got homeworks from each subject: maths, english etc to get them done for tomorrow.Also they bring home textbooks and we know exactly what to teach them at home.
attributes.background:
No textbooks, no homeworks, no communication with parents what they teach kids everyday...so I dont have a clue how and what to teach my kid! I BEG parliament to BRING BACK TEXTBOOKS to schools so PARENTS HAVE AT LEAST CHANCE TO KNOW WHAT PRACTISE WITH KIDS AS WE CANT RELY ON SCHOOLS!
Im Slovakian.

rejection.details:
Decisions about materials for use in schools are not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. 

It is clear that you are concerned about your child's school. This is something that you might want to raise with the school's governing body.
